text: Ra timi junasukai avasthama hunchau va kura'anabata kehi patha garchau va timiharule kunai an'ya kamagarda jaba tyasama sanlagna hunchau, hami tyasako janakari rakhdachau ra timro palanakartabata kunai kura lesa matra pani lukeko chaina. Na jaminama, na akasama ra na kunai kura tyasabhanda sano cha va thulo tara spasta kitabama lekhi'eko cha
